#Ethiopian #victoriafalls #flightresumption https://t.co/hakpZ4GKOC

#Ethiopian #londonmarathon #winners https://t.co/yfMj3bED1X

data.text:
We are working tirelessly in growing our renowned on -board service while prioritizing the well-being and comfort of our customers. Fly with us, benefit from Sheba Comfort our new global COVID-19 insurance package. #Flywithconfidence #FlyEthiopian
https://t.co/1jmv9GxNIC https://t.co/3tQ9Qp3UDp

Africa’s biggest airline, Ethiopian is willing to provide planes, pilots and maintenance services to beleaguered rival South African as part of a joint venture with that country’s government. Ethiopian Airlines' GCEO Mr.Tewolde GebreMariam https://t.co/VRPOm9K6qK

@BerndDoerries Dear Bernd,
we are  deeply sorry for the inconvenience. please  DM your flight details for further assistance or send us an email at   CorporateCommunicationsstaff@ethiopianairlines.com

data.text:
The fleet ready for the day’s work in Addis Abeba.  
Except for emergencies all flying in the early years was during daytime. Addis Abeba had no lights for night landing and when needed cars and other vehicles had to light a path for the pilot.
#Throwbackthursday https://t.co/5n4pkxnE8W
@priyaranjan03 Dear @priyaranjan03, Thank  you for sharing this beautiful video with us.
